articles.title: Will final be Mane's last Afcon dance with Senegal?
articles.summary: Forward Sadio Mane looks to help inspire Senegal to glory against host nation Morocco after the 33-year-old said this will be his "last Afcon final".

articles.title: How Carrick's Man Utd dismantled Man City
articles.summary: Match of the Day pundits Alan Shearer and Wayne Rooney break down how Manchester United's shape frustrated Manchester City in Michael Carrick's first game as interim manager.

articles.title: 'I'll be surprised if he's here next game' - Shearer on Glasner
articles.summary: Match of the Day pundit Alan Shearer expects Oliver Glasner to leave Crystal Palace in the coming week, after his outburst against the board in the wake of their defeat by Sunderland.

articles.title: 'The fans have spoken' - Why Frank's future at Spurs looks bleak
articles.summary: Match of the Day's Mark Chapman, Alan Shearer and Wayne Rooney explain why they think Thomas Frank's time as Tottenham Hotspur manager is about to come to an end following his side's 2-1 home defeat t...

articles.title: 'Why not look into new things?' - Pfannenstiel on Aberdeen dugout noise
articles.summary: Aberdeen sporting director Lutz Pfannenstiel says Scottish football should "not just think about how it was in the past", after being "a bit surprised" by reaction to him joining interim manager Peter...

articles.title: Was this the day Spurs fans finally lost all faith in Frank?
articles.summary: Was the dismal home loss to struggling West Ham the day Spurs fans finally lost all faith in head coach Thomas Frank, asks chief football writer Phil McNulty?

articles.title: Missed opportunity for Arsenal - but were they denied 'clear penalty'?
articles.summary: Arsenal have moved seven points clear at the top of the Premier League after a 0-0 draw at Nottingham Forest - but should the Gunners have been awarded a penalty?

articles.title: Glasner 'feels abandoned completely' at Palace
articles.summary: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner says he feels his squad "are being abandoned completely" by the club's hierarchy.

articles.title: 'No energy' and 'predictable' - Guardiola won't blame VAR for derby loss
articles.summary: Manchester City were outfought by rivals Manchester United on Saturday lunchtime and the damaging defeat could leave them outmanoeuvred in this season's Premier League title race.

articles.title: Ruthless Man Utd beat Man City in dream start for Carrick
articles.summary: Michael Carrick gets off to the perfect start in his first match as interim manager for Manchester United with a two-goal derby win against Manchester City, leaving Pep Guardiola's side winless in the...

articles.title: Arsenal stumble in draw against resilient Forest
articles.summary: Arsenal missed the chance to extend their lead at the top of the Premier League table to nine points, with a goalless draw against a determined Nottingham Forest.

articles.title: Last-minute Wilson goal leaves fans booing Frank's Spurs
articles.summary: A last-minute Callum Wilson goal gives West Ham an important three points and increases the pressure on Tottenham boss Thomas Frank.

articles.title: Chelsea beat Brentford for Rosenior's first Premier League win
articles.summary: Cole Palmer scored a penalty to secure the a for Chelsea against Brentford and give Liam Rosenior his first Premier League win as manager.

articles.title: Super-sub Nmecha wins it for Leeds in stoppage time
articles.summary: Substitute Lukas Nmecha scores in stoppage time to give Leeds an important win against Fulham, and leave them eight points clear of the Premier League relegation zone.

articles.title: Brobbey goal earns Sunderland comeback win over struggling Palace
articles.summary: Enzo Le Fee and Brian Brobbey were on the scoresheet as Sunderland came from behind to beat Crystal Palace, who are without a win in 10 matches in all competitions.

articles.title: Seahawks dominate 49ers to advance to NFC championship game
articles.summary: Seattle Seahawks found a new level of dominance as they stormed to a 41-6 win over San Francisco 49ers in what was their first playoff game in front of home fans in almost a decade.

articles.title: Coventry back on track but Baggies in trouble - Aaron McLean's EFL takeaways
articles.summary: Final Score pundit Aaron McLean gives his five takeaways from what we learned across the Championship, League One and League Two this weekend.

articles.title: Leicester close in on Lehmann signing from FC Como
articles.summary: Leicester City are closing in on the signing of Switzerland forward Alisha Lehmann from FC Como this month.
